name: Paper Pinball Season 2.5
description:
A currently ongoing reformatting and streamlining of all 19 tables in Paper Pinball seasons 1 and 2. The goal is a sleek, definitive edition with consistent rules and feel.

Those who have already purchased season 1 or season 2 will have access to the new versions of the tables they already own. The original versions will remain available for download.
